main event: A driver observed a UFO hovering approximately 300 feet above ground for 24-25 seconds on 29 January 1955.
interesting points: The object was estimated to be 300 feet in diameter and 3/4 inch thick with windows., The sighting lasted for only 24-25 seconds., The object was described as having unusual characteristics that did not lend themselves to any obvious explanation., The identification of the object was deemed undetermined due to insufficient data., The report was part of Project Blue Book, a systematic study of UFO sightings conducted by the U.S. Air Force.
